topic_metadata.title: Broken Square Root Symbol With Concrete Math Font

posts.name: CarrotDLaw
posts.cooked:
Anyone using Typst with Concrete Math font? I face a issue, and I am not sure whether it is Typst’s the font’s fault.

$ min_theta sqrt(1 / n sum_(i = 1)^n (sans("out")_i - sum_(j = 1)^d theta_j sans("feat")_(i j) - theta_0)^2) $

image962×242 16.7 KB

In math block, if the content inside the sqrt gets tall enough, the square root symbol becomes broken. The default New Computer Modern Math works fine though.
posts.raw:
Anyone using Typst with Concrete Math font? I face a issue, and I am not sure whether it is Typst's the font's fault.

```typ
$ min_theta sqrt(1 / n sum_(i = 1)^n (sans("out")_i - sum_(j = 1)^d theta_j sans("feat")_(i j) - theta_0)^2) $
```

![image|690x173, 75%](upload://6YDiOrHvxesL1WEmmAqVnYWZ7fW.png)

In math block, if the content inside the `sqrt` gets tall enough, the square root symbol becomes broken. The default New Computer Modern Math works fine though.

posts.name: Enivex
posts.cooked: Based on Fix bugs in math glyph assembly code by mkorje · Pull Request #5288 · typst/typst · GitHub this is a font bug
posts.raw: Based on https://github.com/typst/typst/pull/5288#discussion_r1815038580 this is a font bug

posts.name: Max
posts.cooked: I’ve sent an email to the author of the font regarding this issue and how it could be fixed. I’ll add an update here once I get a response.
posts.raw: I've sent an email to the author of the font regarding this issue and how it could be fixed. I'll add an update here once I get a response.

posts.name: Max
posts.cooked: A new version (0.64) of the font has been released which includes a fix for this! It is already on CTAN.
posts.raw: A new version (0.64) of the font has been released which includes a fix for this! It is already on [CTAN](https://ctan.org/pkg/concmath-otf?lang=en).
